allAges.name: Harbor House Café
allAges.desc: Comfort-food café with all-day breakfast, kid-friendly portions, and relaxed small town vibes.

allAges.name: Driftwood Grill
allAges.desc: Burgers, fries, and milkshakes a few minutes from the sand easy stop with kids after a long beach day.

allAges.name: Seabrook Corner Café
allAges.desc: Coffee, pastries, and simple breakfast plates in the heart of Seabrook’s walkable village.

adults21.name: Tide & Tap
adults21.desc: Craft beer, coastal cocktails, and bar snacks with a locals’ hangout feel — adults-only after 8pm.

adults21.name: Railside Tavern
adults21.desc: Classic small-town tavern with pool, darts, and a cold pint after a day of driving or exploring.

adults21.name: Harbor Lounge
adults21.desc: Low-key cocktail spot a short drive from town better for date night than bringing the whole crew.

shops.name: Harbor Gift Co.
shops.desc: Local gifts, coastal-themed decor, and easy souvenirs to take a bit of the harbor home with you.

shops.name: Shores Beach Shop
shops.desc: Kites, buckets, and last-minute beach gear the spot to grab what you forgot to pack.

shops.name: Seabrook General & Goods
shops.desc: Small boutique with essentials, snacks, and a few fun finds right in the village.

activities.name: Ocean Shores Beach Access
activities.desc: Wide, drive-on beach with plenty of space for walking, sandcastles, kite flying, and storm watching.

activities.name: Pacific Beach Overlook
activities.desc: Quick stop with big views of the coastline perfect for photos or a quiet moment between plans.

activities.name: Local Forest Walks
activities.desc: Short drives from Hoquiam lead to easy forest trails, great for stretching your legs between beach days.
